info.description: Zohm API - Proxy for Zo authentication and task management
info.name: Zohm API

request.description: Send OTP to mobile number for authentication
Verify OTP and login to get access token. Token is automatically saved to collection variables.
Check if user is logged in
Refresh authentication tokens using refresh token
Get current user's profile from Zo API
Get zone template mapping by ID
Create a new zone template mapping
Update an existing zone template mapping
Get daily performance record by ID
Create a new daily performance record
Create a new whatsapp group mapping
Get staff zone assignment by ID
Create a new staff zone assignment
Get all node zones (optional filter by node_id)
